enableTypes.description: Types of logging to enable (see [CloudWatch docs](/usage/cloudwatch-cluster-logging/#clusterconfig-examples)). Valid entries are: `"api"`, `"audit"`, `"authenticator"`, `"controllerManager"`, `"scheduler"`, `"all"`, `"*"`.
enableTypes.x-intellij-html-description: Types of logging to enable (see CloudWatch docs). Valid entries are: "api", "audit", "authenticator", "controllerManager", "scheduler", "all", "*".

logRetentionInDays.description: sets the number of days to retain the logs for (see [CloudWatch docs](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatchLogs/latest/APIReference/API_PutRetentionPolicy.html#API_PutRetentionPolicy_RequestSyntax)) . Valid values are: 1, 3, 5, 7, 14, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180, 365, 400, 545, 731, 1827, and 3653.

volumeType.description: Valid variants are: `"gp2"` is General Purpose SSD, `"gp3"` is General Purpose SSD which can be optimised for high throughput (default), `"io1"` is Provisioned IOPS SSD, `"sc1"` is Cold HDD, `"st1"` is Throughput Optimized HDD.
volumeType.x-intellij-html-description: Valid variants are: "gp2" is General Purpose SSD, "gp3" is General Purpose SSD which can be optimised for high throughput (default), "io1" is Provisioned IOPS SSD, "sc1" is Cold HDD, "st1" is Throughput Optimized HDD.

NodeGroup.description: holds configuration attributes that are specific to an unmanaged nodegroup
NodeGroup.x-intellij-html-description: holds configuration attributes that are specific to an unmanaged nodegroup

NodeGroupBottlerocket.description: holds the configuration for Bottlerocket based NodeGroups.
NodeGroupBottlerocket.x-intellij-html-description: holds the configuration for Bottlerocket based NodeGroups.

attachPolicy.description: holds a policy document to attach
attachPolicy.x-intellij-html-description: holds a policy document to attach

attachPolicyARNs.description: list of ARNs of the IAM policies to attach
attachPolicyARNs.x-intellij-html-description: list of ARNs of the IAM policies to attach

instanceProfileARN.description: holds the ARN of instance profile, not supported for Managed NodeGroups
instanceProfileARN.x-intellij-html-description: holds the ARN of instance profile, not supported for Managed NodeGroups

NodeGroupIAM.description: holds all IAM attributes of a NodeGroup
NodeGroupIAM.x-intellij-html-description: holds all IAM attributes of a NodeGroup

appMeshPreview.description: enables full access to AppMesh Preview
appMeshPreview.x-intellij-html-description: enables full access to AppMesh Preview

certManager.description: enables the ability to add records to Route 53 in order to solve the DNS01 challenge. More information can be found [here](https://cert-manager.io/docs/configuration/acme/dns01/route53/#set-up-a-iam-role)
certManager.x-intellij-html-description: enables the ability to add records to Route 53 in order to solve the DNS01 challenge. More information can be found here

ebs.description: enables the new EBS CSI (Elastic Block Store Container Storage Interface) driver
ebs.x-intellij-html-description: enables the new EBS CSI (Elastic Block Store Container Storage Interface) driver

externalDNS.description: adds the external-dns project policies for Amazon Route 53
externalDNS.x-intellij-html-description: adds the external-dns project policies for Amazon Route 53

imageBuilder.description: allows for full ECR (Elastic Container Registry) access. This is useful for building, for example, a CI server that needs to push images to ECR
imageBuilder.x-intellij-html-description: allows for full ECR (Elastic Container Registry) access. This is useful for building, for example, a CI server that needs to push images to ECR

NodeGroupInstancesDistribution.x-intellij-html-description: holds the configuration for spot instances

enabled.description: Enables the auto repair feature for the nodegroup
enabled.x-intellij-html-description: Enables the auto repair feature for the nodegroup

NodeGroupNodeRepairConfig.description: contains the auto repair configuration for the nodegroup
NodeGroupNodeRepairConfig.x-intellij-html-description: contains the auto repair configuration for the nodegroup

attachIDs.description: attaches additional security groups to the nodegroup
attachIDs.x-intellij-html-description: attaches additional security groups to the nodegroup

withLocal.description: attach a security group local to this nodegroup Not supported for managed nodegroups
withLocal.x-intellij-html-description: attach a security group local to this nodegroup Not supported for managed nodegroups

withShared.description: attach the security group shared among all nodegroups in the cluster Not supported for managed nodegroups
withShared.x-intellij-html-description: attach the security group shared among all nodegroups in the cluster Not supported for managed nodegroups

NodeGroupSGs.description: controls security groups for this nodegroup
NodeGroupSGs.x-intellij-html-description: controls security groups for this nodegroup

allow.description: If Allow is true the SSH configuration provided is used, otherwise it is ignored. Only one of PublicKeyPath, PublicKey and PublicKeyName can be configured
allow.x-intellij-html-description: If Allow is true the SSH configuration provided is used, otherwise it is ignored. Only one of PublicKeyPath, PublicKey and PublicKeyName can be configured

enableSsm.description: Enables the ability to [SSH onto nodes using SSM](/introduction#ssh-access)
enableSsm.x-intellij-html-description: Enables the ability to SSH onto nodes using SSM

publicKey.description: Public key to be added to the nodes SSH keychain. If Allow is false this value is ignored.
publicKey.x-intellij-html-description: Public key to be added to the nodes SSH keychain. If Allow is false this value is ignored.

publicKeyName.description: Public key name in EC2 to be added to the nodes SSH keychain. If Allow is false this value is ignored.
publicKeyName.x-intellij-html-description: Public key name in EC2 to be added to the nodes SSH keychain. If Allow is false this value is ignored.

publicKeyPath.description: The path to the SSH public key to be added to the nodes SSH keychain. If Allow is true this value defaults to "~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub", otherwise the value is ignored.
publicKeyPath.x-intellij-html-description: The path to the SSH public key to be added to the nodes SSH keychain. If Allow is true this value defaults to "~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub", otherwise the value is ignored.

NodeGroupSSH.description: holds all the ssh access configuration to a NodeGroup
NodeGroupSSH.x-intellij-html-description: holds all the ssh access configuration to a NodeGroup

maxUnavailable.description: sets the max number of nodes that can become unavailable when updating a nodegroup (specified as number)
maxUnavailable.x-intellij-html-description: sets the max number of nodes that can become unavailable when updating a nodegroup (specified as number)

maxUnavailablePercentage.description: sets the max number of nodes that can become unavailable when updating a nodegroup (specified as percentage)
maxUnavailablePercentage.x-intellij-html-description: sets the max number of nodes that can become unavailable when updating a nodegroup (specified as percentage)

NodeGroupUpdateConfig.description: contains the configuration for updating NodeGroups.
NodeGroupUpdateConfig.x-intellij-html-description: contains the configuration for updating NodeGroups.

OIDCIdentityProvider.description: holds the spec of an OIDC provider to use for EKS authzn
OIDCIdentityProvider.x-intellij-html-description: holds the spec of an OIDC provider to use for EKS authzn

controlPlaneInstanceType.description: specifies the instance type to use for creating the control plane instances.
controlPlaneInstanceType.x-intellij-html-description: specifies the instance type to use for creating the control plane instances.

controlPlaneOutpostARN.description: specifies the Outpost ARN in which the control plane should be created.
controlPlaneOutpostARN.x-intellij-html-description: specifies the Outpost ARN in which the control plane should be created.

controlPlanePlacement.description: specifies the placement configuration for control plane instances on Outposts.
controlPlanePlacement.x-intellij-html-description: specifies the placement configuration for control plane instances on Outposts.

additionalEndpointServices.description: specifies additional endpoint services that must be enabled for private access. Valid entries are "cloudformation", "autoscaling" and "logs".
additionalEndpointServices.x-intellij-html-description: specifies additional endpoint services that must be enabled for private access. Valid entries are "cloudformation", "autoscaling" and "logs".

enabled.description: enables creation of a fully-private cluster.
enabled.x-intellij-html-description: enables creation of a fully-private cluster.

skipEndpointCreation.description: skips the creation process for endpoints completely. This is only used in case of an already provided VPC and if the user decided to set it to true.
skipEndpointCreation.x-intellij-html-description: skips the creation process for endpoints completely. This is only used in case of an already provided VPC and if the user decided to set it to true.

PrivateCluster.description: defines the configuration for a fully-private cluster.
PrivateCluster.x-intellij-html-description: defines the configuration for a fully-private cluster.

caBundleCert.description: the CA bundle certificate used by IRA trust anchor. Can't be set if Provider is SSM.
caBundleCert.x-intellij-html-description: the CA bundle certificate used by IRA trust anchor. Can't be set if Provider is SSM.

provider.description: the AWS service responsible for provisioning IAM credentials to remote nodes. Valid options are `SSM` (System Manager), default, and `IRA` (IAM Roles anywhere). Required IRA config (i.e. TrustAnchor, AnywhereProfile) will be created by eksctl behind the scenes.
provider.x-intellij-html-description: the AWS service responsible for provisioning IAM credentials to remote nodes. Valid options are SSM (System Manager), default, and IRA (IAM Roles anywhere). Required IRA config (i.e. TrustAnchor, AnywhereProfile) will be created by eksctl behind the scenes.

roleARN.description: the IAM Role ARN to be added to aws-auth configmap for remote nodes. If not set, eksctl creates the role behind the scenes, adds an entry into the configmap and sets up any other SSM/IRA config. If set, eksctl will only add the configmap entry, while creating any required SSM/IRA config falls under user's responsibility.
roleARN.x-intellij-html-description: the IAM Role ARN to be added to aws-auth configmap for remote nodes. If not set, eksctl creates the role behind the scenes, adds an entry into the configmap and sets up any other SSM/IRA config. If set, eksctl will only add the configmap entry, while creating any required SSM/IRA config falls under user's responsibility.

SecretsEncryption.description: defines the configuration for KMS encryption provider
SecretsEncryption.x-intellij-html-description: defines the configuration for KMS encryption provider

VPCGateway.description: VPCGatewayID the ID of the gateway that facilitates external connectivity from customer's VPC to their remote network(s). Valid options are Transit Gateway and Virtual Private Gateway.
VPCGateway.x-intellij-html-description: VPCGatewayID the ID of the gateway that facilitates external connectivity from customer's VPC to their remote network(s). Valid options are Transit Gateway and Virtual Private Gateway.

volumeType.description: Valid variants are: `"gp2"` is General Purpose SSD, `"gp3"` is General Purpose SSD which can be optimised for high throughput (default), `"io1"` is Provisioned IOPS SSD, `"sc1"` is Cold HDD, `"st1"` is Throughput Optimized HDD.
volumeType.x-intellij-html-description: Valid variants are: "gp2" is General Purpose SSD, "gp3" is General Purpose SSD which can be optimised for high throughput (default), "io1" is Provisioned IOPS SSD, "sc1" is Cold HDD, "st1" is Throughput Optimized HDD.

autoScaler.description: adds policies for cluster-autoscaler. See [autoscaler AWS docs](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/eks/latest/userguide/cluster-autoscaler.html).
autoScaler.x-intellij-html-description: adds policies for cluster-autoscaler. See autoscaler AWS docs.

awsLoadBalancerController.description: adds policies for using the aws-load-balancer-controller. See [Load Balancer docs](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/eks/latest/userguide/aws-load-balancer-controller.html).
awsLoadBalancerController.x-intellij-html-description: adds policies for using the aws-load-balancer-controller. See Load Balancer docs.

ebsCSIController.description: adds policies for using the ebs-csi-controller. See [aws-ebs-csi-driver docs](https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/aws-ebs-csi-driver#set-up-driver-permission).
ebsCSIController.x-intellij-html-description: adds policies for using the ebs-csi-controller. See aws-ebs-csi-driver docs.

efsCSIController.description: adds policies for using the efs-csi-controller. See [aws-efs-csi-driver docs](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/containers/introducing-efs-csi-dynamic-provisioning).
efsCSIController.x-intellij-html-description: adds policies for using the efs-csi-controller. See aws-efs-csi-driver docs.

externalDNS.description: adds external-dns policies for Amazon Route 53. See [external-dns docs](https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/external-dns/blob/master/docs/tutorials/aws.md).
externalDNS.x-intellij-html-description: adds external-dns policies for Amazon Route 53. See external-dns docs.

imageBuilder.description: allows for full ECR (Elastic Container Registry) access.
imageBuilder.x-intellij-html-description: allows for full ECR (Elastic Container Registry) access.
